main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object (UFO) in Garden City, New York on May 12, 1959, was reported by a college student on his way home. The sighting described an object moving erratically, climbing, and showing irregular lights in the sky for a period of about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The UFO was described as moving steadily and rapidly with a bright bluish or greenish light and a faint form behind it.
The object made no noise, and no materials or objects fell or emanated from it.
The witness reported seeing the object again about ten or fifteen minutes later when it was irregularly changing in intensity, possibly at 109 degrees or 45 degrees above the horizon.
An investigation concluded that the witness was not looking at anything unusual through a haze layer, and it was suggested that no material evidence indicated the object reported was actually seen.
The witness requested if anybody else saw the same object and what it was, but no other reports concerning the sighting were received by the Air Force.
